titleStmt.title: Great and wonderful news from France, communicated in a letter from Paris, to a gentleman in London, concerning the great designs of that monarch : as also an account of the answers of the embassadors at Frankfort, to the French embassador's propositions lately made there.
titleStmt.author: J. P., fl. 1682.

titleStmt.title: Great and wonderful news from France, communicated in a letter from Paris, to a gentleman in London, concerning the great designs of that monarch : as also an account of the answers of the embassadors at Frankfort, to the French embassador's propositions lately made there.
titleStmt.author: J. P., fl. 1682.

notesStmt.note: First letter dated: Paris 8. Apr. 82. Signed: J.P.
"The answer of the embassadors asembled at Franckfort, to the French embassador's propositions lately made there" dated: 9th of April, 1682.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
